extension.name: aq
extension.template: @echo off $T color $T {@cmd} ^&^& exit $T color F4 $T @echo on $T echo {@bell}
extension.comment: Launches the command and closes the shell on successful termination. On error the shell is turned red and beeps for attention.

extension.name: aq
extension.comment: Launches the command and closes the shell on successful termination. On error the shell beeps for attention.

alias.name: t

alias.name: p

alias.name: i

alias.name: d
alias.comment: Deploys a project with Maven. Requires a valid Maven-POM.

alias.name: s

alias.name: sd

group.name: project-sync
group.comment: Aliases synchronizing project information with external information systems.

alias.name: b
alias.comment:
Syncs Bugzilla product with Maven-POM.
For more information please refer to the bugzilla plugin's homepage.

alias.name: bi
alias.comment:
Creates product in Bugzilla based on Maven-POM.
For more information please refer to the bugzilla plugin's homepage.

alias.name: chj
alias.comment:
Creates Hudson job based on Maven-POM.
For more information please refer to the hudson plugin's homepage.

alias.name: dhj
alias.comment:
Deletes Hudson job based on Maven-POM.
For more information please refer to the hudson plugin's homepage.

alias.name: a
alias.comment:
Analyzes the dependencies of this project and determines which are: used and declared; used and undeclared; unused and declared. This goal is intended to be used standalone, thus it always executes the test-compile phase - use the dependency:analyze-only goal instead when participating in the build lifecycle.
For more information please refer to the analyze mojo.

alias.name: dpu
alias.comment:
Displays all plugins that have newer versions available.
For more information please refer to the
display-plugin-updates mojo.

alias.name: ddu
alias.comment:
Displays all dependencies that have newer versions available.
For more information please refer to the
display-dependency-updates mojo.

group.name: project-release
group.comment: Aliases to release a project with Maven.

alias.name: r
alias.comment: Prepares and performs the release of a project.

alias.name: rpr
alias.comment:
Prepares the release of a project.
For more information please refer to the prepare mojo.

alias.name: rpe
alias.comment:
Performs the release of a project after it has been prepared.
For more information please refer to the perform mojo.

alias.name: rr
alias.comment:
Runs a rollback after a failed release. Please note that any SCM tags have to be removed manually.
For more information please refer to the rollback mojo.

alias.name: rc
alias.comment:
Runs a clean after a failed release.
For more information please refer to the clean mojo.

alias.name: atlas-rs
alias.comment: Starts the standalone version of confluence for developing purposes. To run a version that is not the LATEST, use: --version 5.6.1 --data-version 5.6.1

group.name: enterprise-architect
group.comment: Aliases to work with Sparx Systems' Enterprise Architect.

alias.name: ea
alias.command: set JAVA_HOME="%JAVA_HOME_6x32%"^&^& set PATH=%JAVA_HOME_6x32%\bin;%PATH% ^&^& set MAVEN_OPTS=%MAVEN_OPTS% -Djava.library.path="%EA_LIB_PATH%"
alias.comment:
Sets environment variable JAVA_HOME to existing JAVA_HOME_6x32 and prepends it to the PATH. Additionally the library path now includes the EA DLL by referencing the existing environment variable EA_LIB_PATH.
To use this alias, please define the environment variables JAVA_HOME_6x32 and EA_LIB_PATH.
